Grilhões Astrais
note:
<Custom Execution>
var rand = Math.floor(Math.random() * 2)
var heroId = BattleManager._targets[0]._actorId;
$gameVariables.setValue(45, BattleManager._targets[0]._actorId)
if($gameActors.actor(heroId).hp > 0){
$gameActors.actor(heroId).addState(48 + rand);
}

</Custom Execution>

<can double cast>

name: Toque Frio
note:
<Bypass Armor Scaling>

<Damage Formula>
// Calculate 10% of target's current MP.
var mp = Math.ceil(b.mp * 0.10);
// Calculate the cap: 20% of user's MaxMP.
var cap = Math.ceil(a.mmp * 0.20);
// Determine if the MP cap is to be used.
mp = Math.min(mp, cap);
// Target loses MP.
b.gainMp(-mp);
// Damage is equal to MP damage dealt.
value = Math.ceil(mp);
</Damage Formula>

description: Ataque de elemento Água.
name: Turbilhão
Relâmpago em Cadeia
note:
<Damage Formula>
// Set the chain multiplier to a value if it doesn't exist.
this._chainmultiplier = this._chainmultiplier || 1.0;
// This is the damage formula.
value = 150 + user.mat * 4;
// Apply the chain multiplier to the damage formula.
value *= this._chainmultiplier;
// Reduce the chain multiplier per target.
this._chainmultiplier -= 0.2;
</Damage Formula>

<Custom Target Eval>
// Adds the selected target to the target list.
targets.push(target);
// Grab the group of alive foes as candidates.
var members = foes.aliveMembers();
// Remove the target from the group of candidates.
members.splice(members.indexOf(target), 1);
// This is the number of extra targets to select with Chain Lightning.
var extraTargets = 2;
// Loop the extra targets.
while (extraTargets--) {
  // Grab a random foe from the alive foes.
  var member = members[Math.floor(Math.random() * members.length)];
  // Check to see if the member exists.
  if (member) {
    // Add the member to the group of targets.
    targets.push(member);
    // Remove the member as a viable candidate.
    members.splice(members.indexOf(member), 1);
  }
}
</Custom Target Eval>

<Enemy or Actor Select>
